title: Sales Manager Transitions to Tech Innovator
sub-title: Leveraging a career of sales expertise to now build user-centric applications
content: In a remarkable career shift, former Sales Manager James Simmonds has embarked on a journey into the tech world, bringing a unique blend of sales acumen and technical skills to the forefront. With a background in leading sales teams and managing operations at companies like The Big Yellow Storage Company and Jessops Europe Ltd., James has turned his focus to full-stack software development. After earning an MSc in Computing from the University of Roehampton and completing a software development bootcamp at BrainStation, he now specializes in creating applications that solve real-world problems. Currently, James is exploring the MERN stack, honing his skills in React, Redux Toolkit, and MongoDB, with a keen interest in developing innovative e-commerce solutions.

title: MSc Computing 1st Class Honours
content: Two years of study finally conclude...
